AutoChessMod:ChessPiece.NAME: Chess Piece
AutoChessMod:ChessPiece.FLAVOR: Ah ha, that's a triple, here's your reward
DESCRIPTIONS: cards of the same tier will give you a #ycombined card with doubled stats. The next #b
card(s) you draw will be autoplayed

AutoChessMod:ZephrysLamp.NAME: Lamp of Zephrys
DESCRIPTIONS: You can triple with one less card (no lower than 2 cards).

AutoChessMod:MagicalGatling.NAME: Magical Gatling
DESCRIPTIONS: On pick up, triple a non - tripled card.

AutoChessMod:CapturedFlag.NAME: Captured Flag
DESCRIPTIONS: Your cards gain #g+1 to their stat.
